Title: pg_ls_replslotdir
Feature: pg_ls_replslotdir ( slot_name text ) â†’ setof record ( name text, size bigint, modification timestamp with time zone )
Description: Returns the name, size, and last modification time (mtime) of each ordinary file in the server's pg_replslot/slot_name directory, where slot_name is the name of the replication slot provided as input of the function. Filenames beginning with a dot, directories, and other special files are excluded.
This function is restricted to superusers and members of the pg_monitor role by default, but other users can be granted EXECUTE to run the function.
